gov.usda.DataCatalogClient

Class NetworkRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usda.DataCatalogClient.NetworkRequest

  • public class NetworkRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class for the networking calls to a CKAN installation.
    Author:
    bbrotsos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkRequest()
      The default constructor will load sample_data/config.json
      NetworkRequest(java.lang.String config_path)
      Allows user to enter in custom config path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createDataset(org.json.simple.JSONObject postJSON)
      Takes in a CKAN formated JSON Object (Packages and Resources) and adds it to the CKAN repository.
      java.lang.String deleteDataset(java.lang.String name, org.json.simple.JSONObject postJSON)
      Deletes a dataset and returns back the result to the user.
      java.lang.String getDataset(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a single dataset from CKAN based on the unique name.
      java.lang.String getOrganizationCatalog(java.lang.String organization)
      Returns a CKAN compliant string of an organization's Datasets also known as Packages in CKAN.
      java.lang.String updateDataset(java.lang.String name, org.json.simple.JSONObject postJSON)
      Takes a single Dataset and updates it on CKAN based on the unique ckan name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
